alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 9:17PM EDT until July 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Warren County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Halifax County in central North Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 916 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warrenton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Warrenton, Halifax, Norlina, Littleton, Weldon, Macon, Medoc Mountain State Park, Lake Gaston and Wise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
